biotools.summary:
a database of endothelial cell transcriptomics data.

EndoDB The endothelial cell database (EndoDB) is a freely accessible added-value database that facilitates bench scientists to unlock the untapped potential of publicly available (single cell) transcriptomics data (Pubmed).
